Posts.Title: Question about recovery time PeaceCat PeaceCat

Posts.Content: Jan 4, 2009 04:18PM - edited Jan 4, 2009 04:18PM by hushabee I too never considered myself sick.  I felt how dare this disease invade my body.  I chose to fight it and with treatment and a mastectomy my cancer is gone.  I consider mysef very lucky that I never got sick with chemo somewhat tired but I kept my usual schedule.  When I was first diagosed I asked my oncologist if it was curable.  She said yes. Music  to me and my husbands ears.  The fight began .  I also believe that your mind is very powerful.  I never liked when people considered me sick   Again I was never sick I just had a fight with something I could not see.  I am so happy to see that I am not the only one who thinks this way.  Thanks to all of you!!!!!! Cheryl
Posts.Title: Do you consider yourself sick? shockedat39 kmccraw423

Posts.Content: Jan 7, 2009 08:12PM hushabee wrote: hi I think everyone is scared when they first here that awful word . After the inital shock and my husband making me promise to fight it , I got pretty mad at what I could not see and was determined that it would not beat me. I never felt sick and I had chemo and rads. Also had a mastectomy.  I am going for my first 3 mth check with being cancer free.  Keep a strong mind.  Remember it invaded your body how dare it!!!!! Ill be praying for you.  Cheryl
